Package org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext

Class RichTextViewer

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext.RichTextViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
public class RichTextViewer
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
Simple rich text viewer control that uses the RichTextPainter to render text with HTML markups on a Canvas.
